mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT
FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id=a.id JOIN sys_role r ON r.id=rm.role_id AND r.useable='1' JOIN sys_user u ON u.role_id=r.id AND u.id= #{userId} WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND r.del_flag ='0' AND u.del_flag ='0' AND a.is_show=1 ORDER BY a.sort

FROM sys_menu a
WHERE a.del_flag = '0'
ORDER BY a.sort
